    Coiled Spring Pins Offer a Unique Balance of Strength and Flexibility
    Easily recognized by its unique 2⅓ coil cross section, Coiled Pins are retained by redial tension when installed into the host component, and they are the only pins with uniform strength and flexibility after insertion.
    Downloaded PDF
